original_text: You and your families will go there to meet with the Lord your God. You will be happy as you eat together there. You will enjoy the results of all your work, because the Lord has blessed you.
korean_text: 거기 곧 너희의 하나님 여호와 앞에서 먹고 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 너희의 손으로 수고한 일에 복 주심으로 말미암아 너희와 너희의 가족이 즐거워할지니라

sentences.original_text: You and your families will go there
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 네 가족은 그곳에 갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: to meet with the Lord your God
You will enjoy the results of all your work
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 모든 일의 결과를 즐길 것이다

sentences.original_text: because the Lord has blessed you
